post_text: September 22, 2017 at 4:35 AM#1HiI want to change the cue numbering of the executor select command line.I have to write badly, I have no error but no satisfactory result, my order:CD seq "myseq"Assign Cue 1 /Number=1 or Assign Cue 1 /Number=1 /widht=1Thank you for your track

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: September 22, 2017 at 7:53 PM#2Use "Move" to renumber cues via command line. TBH though, the renumbering dialog is probably gonna be a lot faster if you have lots of cues to move.

posts.author: willybsm
posts.post_text: September 23, 2017 at 4:38 AM#3I need to change the numbers by a Lua plugin.Move could be the solution but it does not necessarily change to integer number, 1, 2, 3 etc ...if i do eg move cue thru at cue 1 the numbers will be 1, 1.001, 1.002, 1.003 which is not suitable but I will dig into that path.Thank you Ryan

title: change cue numbering
